Class ButtonUtils

java.lang.Object
com.spaceinvaders.frontend.utils.ButtonUtils
public class ButtonUtils extends Object
Utility class for creating buttons in a LibGDX application. Provides methods to create and customize labels with different parameters.

  • Method Details

    • createScreenNavigationButton

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ImageTextButton createScreenNavigationButton(SpaceInvadersGame game, String buttonText, String upImagePath, String downImagePath, float width, float height, float x, float y, ScreenState targetScreen)
      Creates an ImageTextButton for navigating between screens.
      Parameters:
      game - Reference to the SpaceInvadersGame instance.
      buttonText - Text to display on the button.
      upImagePath - Path to the button's "up" (default) image.
      downImagePath - Path to the button's "down" (pressed) image.
      width - Width of the button.
      height - Height of the button.
      x - X position of the button.
      y - Y position of the button.
      targetScreen - Screen to navigate to when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      Configured ImageTextButton instance.

    • createScreenNavigationButton

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ImageButton createScreenNavigationButton(SpaceInvadersGame game, String upImagePath, String downImagePath, float width, float height, float x, float y, ScreenState targetScreen)
      Creates an ImageButton for navigating between screens.
      Parameters:
      game - Reference to the SpaceInvadersGame instance.
      upImagePath - Path to the button's "up" (default) image.
      downImagePath - Path to the button's "down" (pressed) image.
      width - Width of the button.
      height - Height of the button.
      x - X position of the button.
      y - Y position of the button.
      targetScreen - Screen to navigate to when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      Configured ImageButton instance.

    • createBackButton

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ImageButton createBackButton(SpaceInvadersGame game, String upImagePath, String downImagePath, float width, float height, float x, float y, ScreenState nextState)
      Creates a BackButton for navigating to the last screen.
      Parameters:
      game - Reference to the SpaceInvadersGame instance.
      upImagePath - Path to the button's "up" (default) image.
      downImagePath - Path to the button's "down" (pressed) image.
      width - Width of the button.
      height - Height of the button.
      x - X position of the button.
      y - Y position of the button.
      nextState - Screen to navigate to when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      An ImageButton instance configured as a back button.

    • createButton

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ImageTextButton createButton(SpaceInvadersGame game, String buttonText, String upImagePath, String downImagePath, float width, float height, float x, float y)
      Creates an ImageTextButton with text and background textures.
      Parameters:
      game - The SpaceInvadersGame instance to access shared resources and managers.
      buttonText - The text displayed on the button.
      upImagePath - The file path of the texture used when the button is not pressed.
      downImagePath - The file path of the texture used when the button is pressed.
      width - The width of the button.
      height - The height of the button.
      x - The x-coordinate for positioning the button.
      y - The y-coordinate for positioning the button.
      Returns:
      An ImageTextButton instance configured with the given properties.

    • createButton

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ImageTextButton createButton(SpaceInvadersGame game, String buttonText, String upImagePath, String downImagePath)
      Creates an ImageTextButton with text and background textures.
      Parameters:
      game - The SpaceInvadersGame instance to access shared resources and managers.
      buttonText - The text displayed on the button.
      upImagePath - The file path of the texture used when the button is not pressed.
      downImagePath - The file path of the texture used when the button is pressed.
      Returns:
      An ImageTextButton instance configured with the given properties without a set position and size.

    • createImageButton

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ImageButton createImageButton(SpaceInvadersGame game, String upImagePath, String downImagePath, float width, float height, float x, float y)
      Creates an ImageButton with background textures.
      Parameters:
      game - The SpaceInvadersGame instance to access shared resources and managers.
      upImagePath - The file path of the texture used when the button is not pressed.
      downImagePath - The file path of the texture used when the button is pressed.
      width - The width of the button.
      height - The height of the button.
      x - The x-coordinate for positioning the button.
      y - The y-coordinate for positioning the button.
      Returns:
      An ImageButton instance configured with the given properties.
